title: Local request
description: Represents a single interlibrary loan request local record

id.description: Unique local ID (generated UUID) of the request

submissionId.description: Unique ID (generated UUID) of the associated submission

supplierUid.description: Unique ID (generated UUID) of the associated supplier

connectorId.description: The ID of the connector used to make the request to the supplier

itemId.description: Unique ID (generated UUID) of the item associated with the request

requestMetadata.description: Supplier metadata associated with the request
